title: Gifting is shut down!
body:
I want to gift my buddy a trist skin but the option is down. Can someone please tell me why? 




Thanks.{{champion:91}}

replies.body:
Gifting hasn't made it to the Beta Client just yet, but you can launch into the legacy client using the *launch legacy client* button at the login screen, as shown below. Gifting is still available in the Legacy Client, so you can send gifts that way for now.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if you have any questions!
